body_html:
I haven't tried, but I think the easiest way to use tensorflow without ./configure right now would be:
1 - fork it
2 - run ./configure
3 - add the 3 generated files to your repo
4 - depend on the forked repo

body:
I haven't tried, but I think the easiest way to use tensorflow without ./configure right now would be:
1 - fork it
2 - run ./configure
3 - add the 3 generated files to your repo
4 - depend on the forked repo
